body.p:
471
March 16th 5
Benj S. Young
Marion Ky
Sir,
Yours of 20th ultimo to Gov Bramlette, has been referred to This Office for answer.
It is not deemed advisable at present to incerease the number of State troops already in the field -- If in the future, it is determined to raise more, your claims will receive due attention

Very Respectfully
D W Lindsey
Adjutant Genl of Ky
